settings.text: Below are a selection of projects, start-ups and programmes that have be supported or built by The.Workshop.

settings.caption: Making cooking accessible to everyone
settings.heading: Spoonful
settings.text: Utilising assistive technology and AI to convert regular recipes into sensory aware instructions for neurodivergent people and curate meal plans that have safe textures, easy clean-up and step-by-step guidance. Join the waitlist for the app's launch! Coming Soon!

settings.caption: Highly efficient clean energy from passing transport | powering transport infrastructure
settings.heading: Treeva
settings.text:
We worked with Treeva to produce parts for their vertical axis wind turbines which rotate due to turbulent airflow of passing transport creating reliable power generation on site.

These turbines are now being used around the country in pilots on railway test track, by Traffic For London (TFL) and on major road partnerships across the UK.

We made parts for their turbines in house and under 4 weeks, meeting the tight deadline for their first pilot which went ahead in early December 2024.

Learn more about Treeva and their work by clicking the link to go to their website below.

(2024 - 2025)

settings.caption: Irelands first STEM Youth Leadership Programme and Empowering Active Young Engagement In STEM
settings.heading: MicroInfluence STEM
settings.text:
We supported founder Lynetta Wang by helping her to develop her business and strategy into a self-sustaining programme that guides secondary school students to develop socially relevant projects combining their hobbies with STEM disciplines.

Reaching 3000+ students in 9 months!

(2023 - 2024)

settings.caption: Reimagining education for the next generation of engineers | empowering future engineers and solving skill gaps in the workforce
settings.heading: ElectroTilez
settings.text: A hardware kit and online platform combined with a scanner that gives students instant feedback on their builds through AR.

settings.caption: A mobility aid that allows users to navigate their surroundings via AI, LiDAR and GPS
settings.heading: MyVision
settings.text: We worked with Ramneek Kaur Ahluwalia to create 5 functional prototypes - in the space of 3 weeks - for the Paris 2024 Olympics where they were presented to Thomas Bach of the International Olympic Committee - IOC and Andrew Parsons of the International Paralympic Committee.

settings.heading: Highly Efficient Clean Energy From Passing Transport
Problem - Energy Struggles
settings.subheading: Transport companies are struggling to meet their net zero goals, all while the rising electricity demands increase the risks of blackouts and brownouts. Reliable power generation on site is urgently required

settings.heading: Solution - Treeva Turbines
settings.subheading: We provide highly efficient vertical-axis wind turbines which rotate due to the turbulent airflow of passing transport.These turbines are quickly and easily installed on site to generate renewable and reliably power with significant energy cost savings

settings.heading: Samsung Solve For Tomorrow 2024 Winners
settings.subheading: Strategic Allies Limited Tech Spotlight | Samsung SFT Winner

settings.heading: Pilots
settings.subheading: Completed First Pilot | Railway Test Track | Major Roads Partnership 2025

settings.heading: Reimagining Education For The Next Generation of Engineers
settings.subheading: Empowering Future Engineers And Solving Skill Gaps In The Workforce

settings.heading: Problem - Growing Skills Gap
settings.subheading: Educational institutions can't meet demand for electronic engineers. Insurance is expensive, the cost of components and equipment are inaccessible. High risks with the possibility of electric shocks, inhaling fumes and burns. Resources available are confusing and inaccessible - particularly to SEN students.

settings.heading: Solution - ElectroTilez
settings.subheading: Competitively priced platform, reduced risks for practical classes, curated clear and accessible resources, utilizing assistive technology. This empowers students to learn independently and at their own pace.

settings.heading: Achievements
settings.subheading: VocTech Ignite | Samsung SFT Finalist 2024 | Patch | Release Oct 2024
